summary: Diff implements a fuller /admin product-management UI: AdminGate now prompts sign-in first and shows an English Access Denied screen with a Go to Home action; AdminProductsPage renders an Admin Panel with Tabs for Add/Edit Product and Manage Products; new ProductUpsertForm adds validation helpers and category-query integration; new ManageProductsTable adds loading/empty states and stock validation flow; admin mutations include English toast confirmations and cache invalidation to refresh product lists.
